channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ポーランド政府がTVP、Polskie Radio、通信社PAPを清算へ、大統領が2024年までの資金提供計画に拒否権発動（Daniel Tilles/Notes From Poland）
item.description:
Daniel Tilles / Notes From Poland:
Polish government puts TVP, Polskie Radio, and news agency PAP into liquidation, after the country's president vetoed plans to provide funding for 2024  —  In the latest escalation of the bitter struggle for control over Poland's public media, the new government has announced …

item.title: ディズニー、WBD、コムキャスト、パラマウントは、ネットフリックスに対抗するために構築したストリーミング・サービスで2023年に50億ドル以上の損失を出し、2024年に清算の年に直面する（フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Financial Times:
Disney, WBD, Comcast, and Paramount face a year of reckoning in 2024 after losing $5B+ in 2023 from the streaming services they built to compete with Netflix  —  Tie-ups and cuts on menu as Disney, Warner, Comcast and Paramount seek new ways to keep up  —  The world's largest traditional …

item.title: インサイダー・インテリジェンスLinkedInの年間広告収入は、2023年には前年比10.1％増の約40億ドルに達し、2024年には前年比14.1％増になると予想されている（Financial Times）。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Insider Intelligence: LinkedIn's annual advertising revenue, which rose 10.1% YoY to nearly $4B in 2023, is expected to grow 14.1% YoY in 2024  —  Microsoft-owned professional networking site has increased revenues as big brands boycott rival platform  —  Professional social networking site LinkedIn …

item.title: Know Your Meme」「Cracked」などを所有するリテラリーメディアが、リカレント・ベンチャーズから「MEL」誌を買収、2024年に出版再開予定（Paige Skinner/HuffPost）
item.description:
Paige Skinner / HuffPost:
Literally Media, which owns Know Your Meme, Cracked, and other brands, acquires MEL magazine from Recurrent Ventures and plans to restart publishing in 2024  —  Mel magazine publishes stories like “Our Eternal Horniness for the Camp Counselor.”  —  Men are so back: Mel magazine …

item.title: 情報筋インドがアップルに、インドのジャーナリストや野党政治家に国家によるiPhoneハッキングの警告をしたことについて、別の説明をするよう迫った（Washington Post）。
item.description:
Washington Post:
Sources: India pressed Apple to come up with alternative explanations for warning Indian journalists and opposition politicians of state-sponsored iPhone hacks  —  NEW DELHI — A day after Apple warned independent Indian journalists and opposition party politicians in October that government hackers …

item.title: 1分エピソードのドラマを特集する中国資本のアプリ「ReelShort」を紹介。CEOによると、ReelShortは2022年のローンチ以来、2200万ドル以上の収益をあげている（Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
A look at ReelShort, a Chinese-backed app featuring dramas with one-minute episodes; its CEO says ReelShort has generated $22M+ in revenue since its 2022 launch  —  ReelShort aims to succeed where Quibi failed—with cheesy plots and supernatural elements packed into one-minute episodes

item.title: ライオンズゲート、ハズブロのeOneの買収を3億7500万ドルで完了。
item.description:
Jill Goldsmith / Deadline:
Lionsgate closes its acquisition of Hasbro's eOne for $375M plus assuming some production financing loans; Lionsgate's library grows by 6,500 film and TV titles  —  Lionsgate said today its acquisition of global entertainment platform eOne from Hasbro is done.

item.title: 調査：ソーシャルメディア企業は2022年、未成年からの広告収入で合計約110億ドルを米国で稼ぎ出し、12歳以下のユーザーからの収入はYouTubeが最も多く9億5910万ドル（AP通信）
item.description:
Associated Press:
Study: social media companies collectively made nearly $11B in US ad revenue from minors in 2022; YouTube derived the most from users 12 and under, at $959.1M  —  Social media companies collectively made over $11 billion in U.S. advertising revenue from minors last year …

item.title: FCC、ラジオ・テレビ放送局の規制緩和要求を拒否、所有者が市場でコントロールできるテレビ・ラジオ局数の制限を再確認（Al Tompkins/Poynter）
item.description:
Al Tompkins / Poynter:
The FCC rejects radio and TV broadcasters' call for deregulation, reaffirming limits on the number of TV or radio stations that owners can control in a market  —  The owners had argued for looser ownership restrictions given the growth of social media, podcasts and other online services.

item.title: 2023年秋、ハリウッドのストライキにより放送局の視聴率が下落。NFLの試合のおかげでABCとNBCが最も好調だったが、CBSは前年比32％減、FOXは同26％減となった（Rick Porter/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Rick Porter / The Hollywood Reporter:
Broadcast ratings sank in fall 2023 due to the Hollywood strikes; ABC and NBC fared best thanks to NFL games, CBS and Fox fell 32% YoY and 26% YoY, respectively  —  Bright spots like ‘The Golden Bachelor’ and the NFL can't paper over a lost fall for the networks.

item.title: ソルボンヌ大学は1月1日から、非営利の学術データプロバイダーであるOpenAlexを利用する予定であり、研究を無料で利用できるようにしようという動きの高まりを後押ししている（Andrew Jack/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Andrew Jack / Financial Times:
Sorbonne University plans to use OpenAlex, a nonprofit academic data provider, from January 1, boosting a growing movement to make research available for free  —  Paris university's ‘radical decision’ to join OpenAlex challenges for-profit providers  —  A leading French university has cancelled …

item.title: ポーランドの新政権が国営メディアの自由化に踏み切ったことで、2人の対立する公共テレビ局長の人事を含む政治戦争が勃発した（Bartosz Brzeziński/Politico）
item.description:
Bartosz Brzeziński / Politico:
Poland's new government taking sweeping steps to free its state media sets off a political war, including the appointments of two dueling chiefs of public TV  —  WARSAW — Poland's new pro-EU government has taken sweeping steps to free state media from the political stranglehold imposed …

item.title: NYTがOpenAIとマイクロソフトを著作権侵害で提訴、AIの訓練に何百万もの記事が使われたと主張、米主要メディアで初の提訴（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
The NYT sues OpenAI and Microsoft for copyright infringement, alleging they used millions of its articles to train AI, the first major US media outlet to sue  —  Millions of articles from The New York Times were used to train chatbots that now compete with it, the lawsuit said.

item.title: バイデン氏の娘の日記が盗まれたとされる事件で、米判事がProject Veritasの憲法修正第1条の主張を却下。
item.description:
Larry Neumeister / Associated Press:
A US judge rejects Project Veritas' First Amendment claim in the case of the alleged theft of a diary of Biden's daughter; prosecutors may get to see 900+ docs  —  Criminal prosecutors may soon get to see over 900 documents pertaining to the alleged theft of a diary belonging …

item.title: PwCによると、メディアとテレコムの取引量と取引額はさらに減少したという。
item.description:
Alexandra Canal / Yahoo Finance:
Analysts expect another wave of consolidation in 2024 for the media sector, after a year in which PwC says media and telecom deal volume and values fell further  —  Wall Street is ready for the next big media merger.  —  As companies in the space face challenges such as cord cutting …
